Text: I frankly don't see the point in uploading now the sample avi file that was OK but already in the previous faulty folder. Why not just give us the correct version of the full film instead?
And it's not like it got revealed any time close to now, old news, old docu, if it had even been here.

I found a way around it. Do a search in google for the title of this movie and you'll find a fileserve rar by some russian, download it and you can expand it without password or any tricks. It's OK and it's worth the extra trouble.
